subdisciplines.name: Bioethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of ethical issues related to medical treatments, genetic testing, and other areas of biotechnology.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Ethics
subdisciplines.description: Concerned with the ethical considerations related to issues such as global warming and environmental protection.

subdisciplines.name: Applied Ethics
subdisciplines.description: The application of ethical principles to real-world scenarios, such as business ethics or medical ethics.

subdisciplines.name: Metaethics
subdisciplines.description: Investigates the nature of ethical concepts and judgements.
